short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help yourself focus by blocking time-wasting websites!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hocus Focus is a powerful productivity extension designed to help you regain control of your time, stay focused, and increase your productivity. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to enhanced focus with this essential tool.

Features:
• Block Distracting Websites: Take charge of your browsing habits by avoiding time-wasting websites that hinder your productivity. Simply add the domains you want to avoid, and Hocus Focus will prevent you from seeing their content during your dedicated work or study sessions.

• Motivational Quotes: Get inspired and motivated with a collection of carefully curated quotes from notable personalities. Each time you encounter a block page, a new quote will greet you, empowering you to refocus on your goals and make the most of your time.

• User-Friendly Interface: Hocus Focus features an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it easy to manage your distracting domains, adjust settings, and track your progress. Stay in control and stay productive effortlessly.

• Seamless Integration: Hocus Focus seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted workflow. Enjoy its benefits across various websites and platforms, whether you're working on important projects, studying, or engaging in deep work sessions.

Boost your productivity, eliminate distractions, and unlock your full potential with Hocus Focus. Take charge of your time, stay focused, and accomplish more with this essential productivity tool.
